bigquery_cost_reporter.information_schema_query_template:
SELECT
    DATE(creation_time) AS job_date,
    COUNT(*) AS num_queries,
    SUM(COALESCE(total_bytes_billed, 0)) AS total_bytes_billed_for_queries
FROM
    {info_schema_table_name}
WHERE
    creation_time BETWEEN TIMESTAMP_SUB(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), INTERVAL @num_report_days DAY) AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()
    AND job_type = 'QUERY'
    AND parent_job_id IS NULL 
    AND error_result IS NULL 
GROUP BY
    job_date
ORDER BY
    job_date DESC
